name: Microwaves Tee
description: The Microwaves Tee is designed to have a boxy, oversized and slightly cropped fitting with approx ~15cm of positive ease around bust.
sizes_available: XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL
full_text: The Microwaves Tee is designed to have a boxy, oversized and slightly cropped fitting with approx ~15cm of positive ease around bust. It is worked top down in the round, using stockinette stitches. You’ll first start casting on the bottom of the neck, then work your raglan increases until reaching the under arms, where body and armholes are split. Then, you’ll continue working the body in the round while working on some decreases for a better fitting. Sleeves are worked in the round from the stitches on hold of your raglan increases. Neck is also worked in the round by picking up stitches on your initial cast on border. The name of the pattern is inspired by the music “microwaves” by In Explosions. Sizes: XS (S) M (L) XL (XXL) Garment finished bust circumference: 93 (98) 105 (111) 118 (128) cm i.e. 36.6 (38.6) 41.3 (43.7) 46.5 (50.4) in If you find yourself to be in between two sizes, consider sizing down. Please note that the size XXL has not been tested Materials: 2 (2) 3 (3) 4 (4) skeins of Cloud Lang Yarns (100g = 260m) 6mm and 5mm needles stitcch markers Sample picture is knitted in Lang Yarns Cloud Colorway 12 Thank you to all the wonderful testers who helped me develop the pattern <3 I’m super happy to share this pattern for free, feel free to join me on ravelry or instagram if you have any question ! :) Happy knitting, Manon
